comments.body:
@Akasurde @alikins here is a ```return virtual_facts``` missing.
Otherwise the facts are reset later to 'NA' later!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +230,234 @@            if vendor_name in ['VMware Virtual Platform', 'VMware7,1']:
                virtual_facts['virtualization_type'] = 'VMware'
                virtual_facts['virtualization_role'] = 'guest'

        # If none of the above matches, return 'NA' for virtualization_type
